name: Home Battery Rebate (SGIP)
description: 85% discount on backup battery storage ($850 per kWh) through CPUC's Self-Generation Incentive Program Equity program
fullDescription: The Self-Generation Incentive Program (SGIP) Equity program provides substantial incentives for income-qualified households to install home battery storage, covering up to 85% of the cost.
whatTheyOffer:
- 85% discount on battery storage systems
- $850 per kWh incentive
- Covers Tesla Powerwall, Enphase, and other brands
- Backup power during outages
- Can pair with solar for maximum savings
- Priority for Medical Baseline customers
howToGetIt:
1. Must meet income eligibility (CARE/FERA or similar)
2. Work with SGIP-registered contractor
3. Contractor submits application on your behalf
4. Get approved before installation
5. Install qualifying battery storage system
6. Incentive applied to project cost
